description: Reaction as the United States survive a huge scare to reach the last 16 as the Netherlands top Group E at the 2023 Women's World Cup.
title: Fifa Women's World Cup LIVE: Portugal v USA & Vietnam v Netherlands
title_page: Fifa Women's World Cup LIVE: Portugal v USA & Vietnam v Netherlands - score & updates - BBC Sport
maintext:
Follow the Lionesses' match with China
China v England (12:00 BST)
Thanks all, we're bringing our Group E coverage to an end now.
But stick with us for build-up to England's match with China and Haiti's game with Denmark (both at 12:00 BST).
Build-up to those matches has just got under way on our dedicated live page.
See you there!
'The small teams getting better is amazing for women's football'
FT: Portugal 0-0 United States
Vicky Losada
Former Spain midfielder on ITV 1
I think Portugal's style was one of the worst to play against for USA. Sweden is a bit similar to them.
They need to analyse, bring their confidence up.
It's great to see how the tournament is changing, how the small teams are getting better and I think it's amazing for women's football in general.
Post
In the next round the USA will face the Group G winners - which will almost certainly be Sweden.
In the last 16 the Netherlands will play the Group G runners-up. Italy are currently second in that group.
'It's tough to be second'
FT: Portugal 0-0 United States
USA co-captain Alex Morgan speaking after the match to ITV1:
On finishing second in the group: "It's tough to be second, we wanted to go through first. This team gave everything, we just didn't put the ball in the back of the net.
"Players came in and helped the team. It's not the result we wanted but we move forward.
It's just not going in the back of the net, we got so many corners, so many opportunities but just so unlucky."
'USA are not flowing'
FT: Portugal 0-0 United States
Kim Little
Former Scotland midfielder on ITV1
The USA are not flowing or connecting. Rapinoe made a slight difference when she came on but generally their substitutions didn't make an impact.
Going forward into the knockout rounds, that needs to be looked at.
'I enjoyed watching Portugal'
FT: Portugal 0-0 United States
Kim Little
Former Scotland midfielder on ITV1
It is unusual for the USA to be in this position and credit to Portugal for their performance.
They tired a little in the second half and they got the chance at the end.
I really enjoyed watching them.
